entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Emerson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C

Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -31.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
